answerText: moment generating function [or mfg, or M sub x of t][10] The moment generating function of minus t is the two-sided version of this operator applied to the probability density function. This operation takes a function f of t and returns a new function of s by integrating f of t times e to the negative s t dt.
heading: DEES |2014 | Chicago A | 5 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The mean is the first derivative of this function at t equals zero and the variance is the second derivative at zero minus the first derivative squared [10] Name this function of t that is equal to the expectation value of e to the t X for a random variable X.
